title: 为啥我的1.12.2客户端会崩溃呢？
author: MC红石骨灰
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:

  CXLibraryCore (cxlibrary-1.12.1-1.6.1.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// Why did you do that?

replies.author: huyaxiaoni
replies.txt_content: 你可以选择直接在BBS上找整合包或者已经做好了的，，自己加点mod进去，如果还是这样那就是mod问题了
